list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a heated building, typically made largely of glass, for rearing plants out of season or in a climate colder than is natural for them.
educate (a child) to a high level at an earlier age than is usual.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a school that had a reputation for hothousing its girls
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một trường có tiếng uy tín để trang bị những cô gái của nó
